system.description:
You have achieved the highest position in Halfling society - that of the sheriff, the peacekeeper, the sole authority in the relative lawlessness of halfling society

REQUIREMENTS

To become the Halfling Sheriff,

you must earn the Fellowship of the Halflings.

The Halfling Sheriff starts with Size Matters Not.

@UUID[Compendium.fellowship-pbta.halfling-sheriff.Item.0B5nd7CdErEMWXaJ]{SIZE MATTERS NOT}

CUSTOM MOVES

@UUID[Compendium.fellowship-pbta.halfling-sheriff.Item.jAfGVwmD2y7da9tp]{HEY! OVER HERE!}

@UUID[Compendium.fellowship-pbta.halfling-sheriff.Item.qnoJxbqx1gxMPtYD]{I'M IN CHARGE NOW}

@UUID[Compendium.fellowship-pbta.halfling-sheriff.Item.C07W7P4urIqqkHF3]{SLIPPERY BUGGER}

@UUID[Compendium.fellowship-pbta.halfling-sheriff.Item.KEyv6Xnu1qlhWrt2]{SNEAKY SNEAKY}

@UUID[Compendium.fellowship-pbta.halfling-sheriff.Item.rQhwjkiJMh7mD7CY]{WONDER CHEF}

advancements.name: Take the Halfling Core Moves (Sting Like A Bee and The Little Folk). If you already have them, instead increase one of your stats by +1, to a maximum of +3.
